segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's continue from where we left off. Just to confirm, can you hear me okay?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I can hear you just fine, thanks!

segments.advisor_message: Great! So, could you share the full name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Sure! It's, uh, Emily Johnson. I hope that helps.

segments.advisor_message: Perfect! And when was Emily born? If you could give me that in DD-MM-YYYY format.
segments.client_message: Um, she was born on 15-04-2015, if I remember correctly. Is that good?
